name: Telescope Hunter
description:
• "Telescope Hunter" is made to be submitted for the Space Apps Challenge.
  • This game was made by TIP Warriors. Members include:
    • Alimorong, Andrea Faith B.
    • Del Rosario, Christian Ainsley A.
    • Delos Reyes, Jerico Jr. M.
    • Mayordo, Zherish Galvin P.
    • Sarambao, Jesriel John R.
How to play the game?
  • Download and extract the zip file.
  • Run the "Space App Challenge.exe"
  • W, A, S, D to move the spaceship.
  • H to view the list of coordinates.
Objectives:
  • Find all the missing parts of the James Webb Telescope.
